== Description ==
Display the current comment content for use in the feeds. 

== Usage ==
%%%<?php comment_text_rss() ?>%%%

== Parameters ==
None.

== Return Values ==
; (void) : This function does not return a value.

== Examples ==
<!-- Need creative examples. Feel free to link to external examples. -->

== Notes ==
* Uses: [[Function_Reference/apply_filters|<tt>apply_filters()</tt>]] Calls '<tt>comment_text_rss</tt>' filter on comment content.
* Uses: [[Function_Reference/get_comment_text|<tt>get_comment_text()</tt>]]
